message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.GR, cs.IT, cs.NE 

This paper is likely to belong to the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category as it deals with image sensor technology and image processing. It may also belong to the multimedia (cs.MM) sub-category as it involves the acquisition and processing of both color and polarization information. The graphics (cs.GR) sub-category is also a possibility as it deals with image rendering and reconstruction. The information theory (cs.IT) sub-category may be relevant as the paper discusses optimization strategies. Finally, the neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE) sub-category may be relevant as the paper proposes a new model for solving the demosaicing problem.
